import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, ButtonGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Prism as SyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter' import { dark } from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/prism' import { UseEffectCodeSnippet } from './UseEffectCodeSnippet' const UseEffect = () => { const [count, setCount] = useState(0) return ( <>

Count: {count}

{UseEffectCodeSnippet.trim()} ) } export default UseEffect
